hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: The built artifacts including both TCNG_Software apps and TCNG_QA headers/drivers which are all required for QA component testing.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
whoami pwd
if [ -z "$TCNG_FW" ]; then export TCNG_FW="TCNG_Nightly_Jenkins_"$( date +%F ) fi
if [ $TCNG_BUILD_TYPE == "PRODUCTION" ] then JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR=production_tcng_jenkins_images else JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR=latest_tcng_jenkins_images fi
export TNT_PLATFORM_NAME=tcng_at91cap9_e132mb
if [ -e TCNG_BUILD.bin ] then echo "Going to untar the tarball for testing ... TCNG_BUILD_TARBALL.tar.gz" export FLASH_IMAGE_PATH=TCNG_BUILD.bin else echo "No tarball provided, so use the default one ..." export FLASH_IMAGE_PATH=`ls -t /tmp/buildhost/$JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR/$TCNG_FW/tcng_at91cap9_e132mb/*.bin | head -1` fi
echo " ******************* $TCNG_FW *****************************"
export TCNG_PACKAGE_ROOT=${WORKSPACE}/var/workspace/TCNG_Software export TCNG_CFG_DIR=${HOME}/workspace/TCNG_QA/ci
echo "Going to setup the environments for TCNG framework ..." source $TCNG_CFG_DIR/cfg.tcng/source_me_first_tcng_env.sh
rm -rf var; rm -rf test_reports
if [ -e TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz ] then echo "Going to untar the tarball for testing ... TCNG_BUILD_TARBALL.tar.gz" tar --atime-preserve -zxvf TCNG_BUILD_QA_TARBALL.tar.gz > /tmp/logs/tcng_build_tarball.log 2>&1 else echo "No tarball provided, so use the default one ..." tar --atime-preserve -xvf /tmp/buildhost/$JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR/$TCNG_FW/tcng_package_qa/"tcng_package_qa_"$BUILD_NUMBER".tar.gz" > /dev/null fi
echo "Goging to set the testsuite: $TCNG_TESTSUITE ..." export TCNG_TEST_SUITE=${TNT_TCNG_QA_TOPDIR}/testcases/Common/Component/$TCNG_TESTSUITE/$TCNG_TESTSUITE.xml
echo "Going to flash the testbed and run the test suite ..." $TCNG_CFG_DIR/myex.pl --config $TCNG_CFG_DIR/cfg.tcng/TCNG_Test_Only.cfg
if [ -e test_reports ] then echo "Goging to save the testing logs" test_report_tarball=TCNG_Comp_Full_TestResult.tar.gz tar -zcvf ${test_report_tarball} test_reports dest_dir="/tmp/buildhost/$JENKINS_IMAGE_DIR/$TCNG_FW/tcng_at91cap9_e132mb/test_reports" echo "Goging to save the testing logs under ${dest_dir} ..." mkdir -p ${dest_dir} && cp ${test_report_tarball} ${dest_dir} fi
# Please replace this with # /workspace/jenkins_run_component_tests.sh

email.subject: $PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
$PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
$PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
$PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
